name: LICH (Jack, i_cam, Cygis, Thomas Gelman)
description: Haunted Freefall is the game produced by team LICH for the VGDC "Fall" game jam. Trapped in an enchanted and haunted mansion, the main objective is to stay alive and keep falling, dodging ghosts, skeletons, and the horrors of the house! Along the way, the player can replenish health from the magical Golden Dragon soda and find relics in the depths.
